name: Petualangan Timun Mas
description:
Timun Mas will be fight from her destiny.  but a Rakhsasa want  Timun mas as a dinner and her magic power.

Receipt skill:

you can combine item to be your skill or your weapon.

  + =

Input:

  • A - Move left
  • D - Move Right
  • Space - Jump
  • 1 - skill slot 1
  • 2 - skill slot 2
  • 3 - skill slot 3
  • J - attack
  • I - inventory menu
  • Esc - Menu
